title: 关于hypixel的问题
author: 臭角真香！
txt_content:
rt，我被hypixel ban了2天，但我不知道为神么，请各位帮一下，谢谢！

replies.author: qsefthuopq
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 qsefthuopq 于 2018-7-5 21:30 编辑 

官网有封禁的原因解释Inappropriate Drawing/Building
If you were banned for inappropriate drawing or inappropriate building, this means that you were either drawing an inappropriate picture in pixel painters, or you were building inappropriate structures in minigame.?
复制代码
你在建筑的小游戏里建了不雅建筑
